entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.9°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -29.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
